name: Vociferous Patch Attack
description:
A cooperative yelling game where you play as a truck and it's attached turret in order to repair relays that will protect from an alien invasion. Yell at the screen to repair yourself and the relays. Requires Mic Input.

Made during the 2020 Global Game Jam, with the theme "Repair".

GGJ Site - https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/vociferous-patch-attack-7
